articles.title: AirAsia boss Tony Fernandes apologises after Thai CEO hurls F-bomb at female colleague in online meeting - Malay Mail
articles.description: PETALING JAYA, July 27 — AirAsia Group boss Tan Sri Tony Fernandes has apologised for the behaviour of the airline’s Thailand chief executive officer (CEO) Tassapon Bijleveld during a virtual town hall meeting. Bijleveld was heavily criticised on social media…
articles.content:
Tony Fernandes said he called the female employee shortly after the meeting to apologise for Bijlevelds conduct. Picture by Firdaus Latif

articles.author: Karen Tee
articles.title: Can investing in Southeast Asian art really make you money? - CNA - CNA
articles.description: As global interest in art from this underrated region grows, owning local art could turn out to be a savvy investment – but only if you have the passion and patience. We speak to art gallery owners and auction houses to find out more.
